resources.string: Quotes always need to surround a String.
The keyword final means "can not be changed".
A public class means no one can access it.
Use the keyword to import to use built in Java Classes.
A colon needs to be at the end of a line of code.
A map data structure has a key and a value for parameters.
One of the first programs students create is "Hello World".
Boolean is not a primitive type.
Congratulations!! You got all the questions correct!
Are you sure you want to do this?
